name: Rework Holdings Pte Ltd
description: Provider of co-working space intended to offer community-based office services for entrepreneurs, startups and small businesses. The company's co-working space with a turnkey services for managed workspace, private office, meeting rooms and event space, enabling entrepreneurs to access networking, advisory services and opportunities within a single communal workspace.
one_liner: Provider of co-working space intended to offer community-based office services for entrepreneurs, startups and small businesses. The company's co-working space with a turnkey services for managed workspace, private office, meeting rooms and event space, enabling entrepreneurs to access networking, advisory services and opportunities within a single communal workspace.
